pkgmetadata.longdescription: Baumgartner Weiss Schindler Test of Equal Distributions // Performs the 'Baumgartner-Weiss-Schindler' two-sample test of equal probability distributions, doi:10.2307/2533862. Also performs similar rank-based tests for equal probability distributions due to Neuhauser doi:10.1080/10485250108832874 and Murakami doi:10.1080/00949655.2010.551516.
